Privacy Policy
Last modified: April 23, 2023
Introduction
AYADI FZ LLC (“Company” or “We“) respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This policy describes:
- The types of information we may collect or that you may provide when you purchase, download, install, register with, access, or use the Ayadi Website (the “Website“).
- Our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
This policy applies onl...

You may be required to provide financial information before placing an order through the Website.
- Your search queries on the Website including filters, usage behavior, favorites, etc.
- As well as– chat text.
You may also provide information for publication or display (“Posted“) on public areas of websites you access through the Website (collectively, “User Contributions“). Your User Contributions are Posted and transmitted to others at your own risk. Although you may set certain privacy setti...

regarding your information and how we will treat it. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, do not download, register with, or use this Website. By downloading, registering with, or using this Website, you agree to this privacy policy. This policy may change from time to time (see Changes to Our Privacy Policy). Your continued use of this Website after we revise this policy means you accept those changes, so please check the policy periodically for updates.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects traffic data, location data, logs, communication data, device information (unique device identifier, IP address, operating system, browser type, mobile network information, telephone number), stored information and files (metadata, photographs, audio and video clips, personal contacts, address book info), and may access search queries, favorites, chat text, and other user contributions.

content: Device information (unique device identifier, IP address, operating system, browser type, mobile network information, telephone number)
Stored information and files (metadata, photographs, audio and video clips, personal contacts, address book information)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions various types of data that the app may collect, ranging from traffic data to user contributions. This data is collected for purposes outlined in the policy.
reply.reference: The app collects traffic data, location data, logs, communication data, device information (unique device identifier, IP address, operating system, browser type, mobile network information, telephone number), stored information and files (metadata, photographs, audio and video clips, personal contacts, address book info), and may access search queries, favorites, chat text, and other user contributions. URL: https://ayadihealth.co/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the option to opt out of data collection or delete their data by adjusting user preferences in their account profile or by submitting a detailed request via the contact us page.
reply.reference: If you do not want us to use your email address to promote our own or third parties’ products or services, you can opt-out by logging into the Website and adjusting your user preferences in your account profile by checking or unchecking the relevant boxes. Upon your request, we shall delete your personal information which will also require deleting your user account. For data deletion requests, please submit a detailed request using the contact us page. URL: https://ayadihealth.co/privacy-policy/
